services.title: Full-Stack Applications
services.bio: Building high-concurrency platforms with Go backends and Svelte frontends. I specialize in bridging complex business logic with fast, SEO-dominant architecture.

services.title: Workflow Automation
services.bio: Eliminating manual bottlenecks by architecting custom digital intake pipelines and automated API-driven data flows.

services.title: Technical Strategy
services.bio: Modernizing outdated infrastructure by integrating modern tech stacks with legacy business systems to ensure long-term stability.
